soft_skills.phrase: taking ownership of the entire product
Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts.
Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements

profile.rationale: The job explicitly requires developing and integrating AI (specifically LLMs like GPT-4/Claude) into full-stack web applications (Macro-Category A), while also involving direct work with these cutting-edge AI technologies (Macro-Category B). The emphasis on owning the entire product lifecycle and integrating across front-end and back-end points to a strong software engineering foundation augmented by GenAI specialization.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and detailed, explicitly outlining both software engineering and AI-specific responsibilities, and distinguishing the role from more specialized or less integrated positions.
